text.text:
<https://gcc2021.sched.com/event/ihpR/americas-session-4|Session 4> starts in 10 mins with the following fantastic talks:

- Designing a comprehensive workflow for detection and functional annotation of lncRNA, Bianca Pasat
- Automated Deployment of Genome Databases for Marine Brown Algae Using Galaxy Genome Annotation (GGA), Loraine Guéguen
- Galaxy-ML: An Accessible, Reproducible, and Scalable Machine Learning Toolkit for Biomedicine, Kaivan Kamali
- The immuneML Portal: a public Galaxy server for machine learning analysis of adaptive immune receptor repertoires, Lonneke Scheffer
- The Galaxy Public Health Community, Peter van Heusden
- A flexible Galaxy-based platform for the analysis of microbial WGS data in public health, Bert Bogaerts
- The “ARIES Genomics” Italian public health surveillance system, Arnold Knijn
- Fostering Public Health Bioinformatics and Collaboration with GalaxyTrakr, Justin Payne

Captions for individual talks can be accessed with the [CC] icon on the video.
